name: nickmykkanen-personal-website
description: A personal website for Nick Mykkanen

scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && mkdir dist && rimraf ./temp && mkdir temp
scripts.compile: babel src/js/script.js --presets=@babel/env | uglifyjs > dist/js/script.js && node-sass src/scss/style.scss ./temp/style.css --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer --no-map -o ./temp/style.css ./dist/css/style.compiled.css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cpx src/*.html dist/

author: Nick Mykkanen
